metadata.synopsis: Three back-to-back anime films by three different directors make up this sci-fi trilogy three years in the making. In the chilling "Magnetic Rose," engineers on a spacecraft board an abandoned space station and encounter disturbing paranormal forces. A young lab worker accidentally swallows a chemical weapon and becomes a walking killing machine in "Stink Bomb." In "Cannon Fodder," a young boy and his father fight for survival in a city functioning on paranoia.
metadata.genre: Animation/Anime & Manga/Art House & International/Science Fiction & Fantasy
metadata.director: Kouji Morimoto, Katsuhiro Ohtomo, Tensai Okamura

reviews: Like any anthology, it can't help but feel misshapen, but even its weakest moments are still awfully successful and worthwhile.
A trilogy of anime aimed more at adults than kids. From slow and thoughtful to hilarious to pointedly satiric. Anime at its best.
